extendedInfo.description: How funny is Mr (Leslie) Chow form the Hangover and Hangover Part2?! Here are 15 hilarious, instantly recognisable quotes. Settable as either ringtone, notification, individual contact ringtone or alarm.They make awesome ringtones/notifications/alarms, especially alarms!!HIGH QUALITY SOUND.SEE SCREENSHOTS FOR CLIPS INCLUDED.FEATURES:* Set as phone ringtone* Set as phone notification* Set as individual contact ringtone - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an individual contact ringtone.* Set as alarm - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an alarm sound.Press to play and long press to set as ringtone or notfication.Excellent sound quality.Any suggestions are welcome.Any problems please email for a fix.

reviews.title: not much in soundboard..
reviews.comment: a would rate it more but not much on the soundboard...there\'s more on the free versions only trouble with them are the ads and spam...if you get more clips and more clearer ad give it more...
reviews.author: A Google User
